H0.text: The name of what type of pasta comes from the Italian for ' ridged ' . Cavatelli

H1.text: The name of what type of pasta comes from the Italian for ' ridged ' . Paccheri

H2.text: The name of what type of pasta comes from the Italian for ' ridged ' . Trofie

H3.text: The name of what type of pasta comes from the Italian for ' ridged ' . RIGATONI

A4.text: The word rigatoni comes from the Italian word rigato (that stands for 'lined', 'striped', 'ruled', rigatone being the augmentative, and rigatoni the plural form), which means 'ridged' or 'lined'
